readable.title: 2929272606_2a5923b38e
readable.content: A little girl in a blue shirt is pointing at the water on the beach . A little girl with a blue shirt is standing by a man wearing sunglasses on the beach . A young girl is looking at a body of water while an older male kneels behind her . A young girl is pointing at water on a beach . A young girl is standing on the shore and pointing to the ocean .
